text: Cuca Legal is a Brazilian telenovela produced and broadcast by Rede Globo. It premiered on 27 January 1975 and ended on 13 June 1975, with a total of 119 episodes. It's the fifteenth "novela das sete" to be aired at the timeslot. It is created by Marcos Rey, directed by Gonzaga Blota, Oswaldo Loureiro and Jardel Mello. == Cast == {|class="wikitable sortable" |- style="background:#ccc;" ! Actor !!
